member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.MRUFiles
member.summary: A collection of the most recently used (MRU) files. Each item in the collection is a filename.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.MRUFiles.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a reference to an item at the specified index in the collection.
member.returns: Filename of the most recently used file at the specified index.
member.param: Specifies the index of the item to retrieve.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.MRUFiles.Count
member.summary: Returns the number of items in the collection.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.MRUFiles.Max
member.summary: Specifies the maximum size of the collection.
member.remarks: The MRUFiles collection cannot become larger than the size this property specifies. When the collection reaches the maximum size, new items you add to the beginning of the collection replace the oldest items at the end of the collection. The Application Manager control persists the value this property specifies.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.MRUFiles.Clear
member.summary: Removes all items from the collection.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.MRUFiles.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the specified item from this collection, if it exists.
member.returns: Returns True when the item is removed from the collection. Returns False when the item is not found.
member.param: Specifies the filename to remove from the collection.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.MRUFiles.GetDisplayName(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a string that you can display in a menu used for opening the most recently used files.
member.returns: The display name of the filename at the index.
member.param: Specifies the index of an item.
Specifies the maximum width, in pixels, of the display name string. The width of the string is measured using the system menu font.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.MRUFiles.Add(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a filename to the beginning of the collection.
member.param: Specifies the filename to add to the collection.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectedSteps
member.summary: A collection of selected steps. You can obtain a reference to the collection from the SequenceFileViewMgr.SelectedSteps and ExecutionViewMgr.SelectedSteps properties.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectedSteps.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a reference to an item at the specified index in the collection.
member.returns: The step at the specified index in the collection.
member.param: Specifies the index of the item to retrieve.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectedSteps.Count
member.summary: Returns the number of items in the collection.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectedSteps.Clear
member.summary: Removes all items from the collection.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectedSteps.AddStepIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds a step to the collection.
member.remarks: When the SequenceFileViewMgr.StepGroupMode property is StepGroupMode_AllGroups, call the SelectedSteps.AddStep method instead of this method.
member.param: Specifies the index in the current step group of the step to add.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectedSteps.EndSelected
member.summary: Specifies whether the End step is selected.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectedSteps.GetStepIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the step index within a step group of a selected step.
member.returns: The step index of the step in the collection.
member.param: Specifies the index of a step in the collection.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectedSteps.GetStepGroup(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the step group of the specified step in the collection.
member.param: Specifies the index of a step in the collection.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectedSteps.AddStep(NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.API.Step)
member.summary: Adds a step to the collection.
member.param: Specifies the step to add.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectedSteps.AddSteps(System.Object[])
member.summary: Adds an array of steps to the collection.
member.param: Specifies the steps to add.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectedSteps.SelectionFlags
member.summary: When the SequenceFileViewMgr.StepGroupMode property is StepGroupMode_AllGroups, this property indicates whether the selection includes the step group start and end markers. The property also indicates whether each step group is expanded or collapsed. The value of this property is a bitwise-OR combination of the SelectionFlags constants.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectedSteps.BeginUpdate
member.summary: Call this method before making multiple changes to the SelectedSteps collection. When you finish changing the collection, call the SelectedSteps.EndUpdate method to update the TestStand User Interface (UI) Controls according to the changes.
member.remarks: Use this method to minimize redrawing in the TestStand UI Controls when you programmatically change the selection.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectedSteps.EndUpdate
member.summary: Updates the user interface according to all changes to the SelectedSteps collection you made after the previous call to the SelectedSteps.BeginUpdate method.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.Strings
member.summary: A collection of strings. You can obtain a reference to the collection from the ApplicationMgr.CommandLineArguments property, the ExpressionEdit.GetValidEvaluationTypes, and ExpressionEdit.SetValidEvaluationTypes methods, and the ApplicationMgr.ProcessUserCommandLineArguments event.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.Strings.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a reference to an item at the specified index in the collection.
member.returns: The item at the specified index.
member.param: Specifies the index of the item to retrieve.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.Strings.Count
member.summary: Returns the number of items in the collection.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.Strings.Clear
member.summary: Removes all items from the collection.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.Strings.Add(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a string to the end of the collection.
member.param: Specifies the string to be added.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.Strings.Insert(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new item to the collection at the specified index.
member.param: Specifies the index of the item to insert.
Specifies the string to be added.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.Strings.Remove(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the specified item from this collection, if it exists.
member.param: Specifies the index of the item to remove.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.CaptionConnection
member.summary: Represents a connection to a caption source.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.CaptionConnection.Source
member.summary: Specifies the type of caption source to obtain the text from.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.CaptionConnection.LongName
member.summary: For certain caption sources, this property specifies whether to return a long or short version of the caption text. Refer to the CaptionSources enumeration for more information about determining when this option affects the text and for more information about the long and short versions of the text.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.CaptionConnection.FormatExpression
member.summary: Specifies a format expression to evaluate when generating the caption text.
member.remarks: For CaptionSource_MacroExpression, specify a format expression that evaluates to a string value that contains macros that specify other caption sources. For all other caption sources, specify a format expression that evaluates to a string value that contains the characters %1. This method replaces the %1 characters with the text from the caption source. Pass an empty string to use the default format for the caption source.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.CaptionConnection.Refresh
member.summary: Refreshes the user interface control connected to this CaptionConnection with the most recent text from the CaptionSource.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.CommandConnection
member.summary: Represents a connection to a CommandKind.

member.summary: Specifies the type of Command to which this CommandConnection connects.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.CommandConnection.Index
member.summary: Specifies which command in the set of commands to use.

remarks.para: Note: Use this on sets of commands. Refer to the CommandKinds enumeration for more information about supported command sets.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.CommandConnection.Options
member.summary: Specifies the behavior of the CommandConnection.
member.remarks: The value of this property is a bitwise-OR combination of the CommandConnectionOptions constants.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.CommandConnection.Refresh
member.summary: Refreshes the state of the user interface control connected to the CommandConnection.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.CommandConnection.FreezeRefresh(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Specifies to freeze the CommandConnection when setting the properties to avoid flicker on the connected control.
member.remarks: FreezeRefresh calls must be balanced. For example, each time you call this method with a value of True, you must also call it with a value of False.
member.param: When this parameter is True, the CommandConnection does not refresh the control. When this parameter is False, the CommandConnection refreshes the control.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SequenceViewConnection
member.summary: Represents a connection from a SequenceFileView Manager control to a SequenceView control. The SequenceView control shows the contents of the current sequence in the SequenceFileView Manager control. Use the SequenceFileViewMgr.Connections property to obtain a collection of SequenceViewConnection objects.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SequenceViewConnection.UIControl
member.summary: Returns the user interface control the connection connects to a SequenceFileView Manager control.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SequenceViewConnection.DoubleClickEditsStepProperties
member.summary: Specifies whether the connected SequenceView control displays the Step Properties dialog box when editing is enabled and the user double-clicks a step. This property defaults to True. Set the property to False if you implement an alternate behavior for double-clicking a step in a sequence file.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SequenceViewConnections
member.summary: A collection of SequenceViewConnection objects you obtain by calling the SequenceFileViewMgr.Connections property.

member.param: Specifies the index of the item to retrieve.

member.summary: Returns the number of items in the collection.

member.summary: Creates and adds a new SequenceViewConnection to the collection.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SequenceFileListConnection
member.summary: Represents a connection from a SequenceFileView Manager control to a control that displays a list of open sequence files. Use the connected control to select a sequence file to open in the SequenceFileView Manager control from the list of sequence files.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SequenceFileListConnection.ShowFullPath
member.summary: When this property is True, the connected control displays the full path for all sequence files. Otherwise, the connected control displays only filenames.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SequenceFileListConnection.ShowCommentInTip
member.summary: Specifies whether the item tooltip includes the sequence file comment in controls you connect to display the list of loaded sequence files.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SequenceListConnection
member.summary: Represents a connection from a SequenceFileView Manager control to a control that displays a list of sequences for the current sequence file. Use the connected control to select the sequence to display.

member.summary: Returns the user interface control the connection connects to a SequenceFileView Manager control.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SequenceListConnection.GetColumnVisible(NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SeqListConnectionColumns)
member.summary: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the column is visible.
member.param: Specifies the column to select.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SequenceListConnection.SetColumnVisible(NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SeqListConnectionColumns,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Specifies whether the column is visible.
member.remarks: You cannot hide the SeqListConnectionColumn_Label column.
member.param: Specifies the column to select.
Pass False to hide the column. Otherwise, the column is visible.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SequenceListConnection.ShowCommentInTip
member.summary: Specifies whether the item tooltip includes the sequence comment in controls you connect to display the list of sequences in the selected sequence file.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SequenceListConnection.GetColumnIndex(NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SeqListConnectionColumns)
member.summary: When the specified column is visible, this method returns the index of the column within the ListBoxColumns collection. Otherwise, this method returns -1.
member.remarks: Use this index in the ListBoxColumns.Item property to return the ListBoxColumn for a specific column.
member.param: Specifies the column to select.

member.summary:

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionViewConnection
member.summary: Represents a connection from an ExecutionView Manager control to an ExecutionViewMgrConnections.ExecutionView property. When tracing is enabled, the connected control shows the steps of the execution as they are executing. Use the ExecutionViewMgr.Connections property to obtain a collection of ExecutionViewConnection objects.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionViewConnection.ColorRunning
member.summary: Specifies the background color of the control when the execution in the ExecutionView Manager control is running. This setting is ignored when the value of the ExecutionViewConnection.Options property is ExecutionViewConnection_IgnoreColors.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionViewConnection.ColorPaused
member.summary: Specifies the background color of the control when the execution in the ExecutionView Manager control is paused. This setting is ignored when the value of the ExecutionViewConnection.Options property is ExecutionViewConnection_IgnoreColors.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionViewConnection.ColorStopped
member.summary: Specifies the background color of the control when the execution in the ExecutionView Manager control is stopped. This setting is ignored when the value of the ExecutionViewConnection.Options property is ExecutionViewConnection_IgnoreColors.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionViewConnection.Options
member.summary: Specifies the behavior of the ExecutionViewConnection. The value of this property is a bitwise-OR combination of the ExecutionViewOptions constants.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionViewConnection.UIControl
member.summary: Returns the user interface control the connection connects to an ExecutionView Manager control.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionViewConnections
member.summary: A collection of ExecutionViewConnection objects you obtain by calling the ExecutionViewMgr.Connections property.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionViewConnections.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a reference to an item at the specified index in the collection.
member.returns: Item located at the specified index.
member.param: Specifies the index of the item to retrieve.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionViewConnections.Count
member.summary: Returns the number of items in the collection.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionViewConnections.Add(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates and adds a new ExecutionViewConnection to the collection.
member.returns: New ExecutionViewConnection.
member.param: Specifies the user interface object to connect.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionViewConnections.Remove(System.Object)
member.summary: Removes the specified item from this collection, if it exists.
member.returns: Returns True when the ExecutionViewConnection is removed. Returns False when the ExecutionViewConnection is not found.
member.param: Specifies the user interface object to disconnect.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionViewConnections.Clear
member.summary: Removes all items from the collection.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionViewConnections.FromControl(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns the ExecutionViewConnection that is connected to the uiObj parameter.
member.returns: ExecutionViewConnection connected to the uiObj parameter. When no ExecutionViewConnection exists for this control, this method returns NULL.
member.param: Specifies the connected user interface object.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.CallStackConnection
member.summary:
Represents a connection from the ExecutionView Manager control to a control that displays the callstack. You can use the connected control to change the selected sequence context when the execution is paused.
Note: This class currently contains no properties or methods. Properties or methods might be added to this class in future versions of TestStand.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ThreadListConnection
member.summary:
Represents a connection from the ExecutionView Manager control to a control that displays the list of threads in the execution. You can use the connected control to display the foreground thread and to change the foreground thread when the execution is paused.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionListConnection
member.summary: Represents a connection from the ExecutionView Manager control to a control that displays the list of currently running executions. You can use the connected control to select an execution from the list of executions.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionListConnection.ShowHiddenExecutions
member.summary: When this property is True, the execution list shows executions created with the ExecTypeMask_InitiallyHidden flag.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.ExecutionListConnection.DisplayExpression
member.summary: Specifies how to display executions in the execution list using a format expression. By default, the value of this property is "%CurrentExecution%". Refer to the CaptionSource_MacroExpression enumeration value for more information about types of caption sources.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectedSequences.BeginUpdate
member.summary: Call this method before making multiple changes to the SelectedSequences collection. When you finish changing the collection, call the SelectedSequences.EndUpdate method to update the TestStand User Interface (UI) Controls according to the changes.
member.remarks: Use this method to minimize redrawing in the TestStand UI Controls when you programmatically change the selection.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectedSequences.EndUpdate
member.summary: Updates the user interface according to all changes to the SelectedSequences collection you make after a previous call to the SelectedSequences.BeginUpdate method.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.InsertionPaletteConnection
member.summary: Represents a connection from a SequenceFileView Manager control to an InsertionPalette control. The InsertionPalette control displays a list of step types and a list of user defined template steps, sequences, and variables. Use the connected control to insert a step, sequence, or variable into a sequence file.

member.summary: Returns the user interface control the connection connects to a SequenceFileView Manager control.

Controls connected to the SequenceFileView Manager and ExecutionView Manager controls, such as the VariablesView, automatically update the collection while active. You can obtain a reference to the collection from the SequenceFileViewMgr.SelectedPropertyObjects and ExecutionViewMgr.SelectedPropertyObjects properties.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SeqListConnectionColumns
member.summary: These constants represent the column type you can use with the column parameter of the SequenceListConnection.SetColumnVisible and SequenceListConnection.GetColumnVisible methods.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SeqListConnectionColumns.SeqListConnectionColumn_Label
member.summary: (Value: 0) Specifies the column that contains the name of the sequence.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SeqListConnectionColumns.SeqListConnectionColumn_Comments
member.summary: (Value: 1) Specifies the column that contains the comment of the sequence.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SeqListConnectionColumns.SeqListConnectionColumn_Requirements
member.summary: (Value: 2) Specifies the column that contains the requirements of the sequence.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectionFlags
member.summary: Use these constants to select step group start or end markers and to expand or collapse step groups. These constants apply only when the application displays more than one step group at a time. You cannot select step group start and end markers when steps are selected. You cannot select steps and step group end markers in collapsed step groups.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectionFlags.SelectionFlag_NoFlags
member.summary: (Value: 0) No collapsed step group and no selected step group markers.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectionFlags.SelectionFlag_SetupStartSelected
member.summary: (Value: 1) Selects the start marker for the Setup step group.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectionFlags.SelectionFlag_MainStartSelected
member.summary: (Value: 2) Selects the start marker for the Main step group.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectionFlags.SelectionFlag_CleanupStartSelected
member.summary: (Value: 4) Selects the start marker for the Cleanup step group.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectionFlags.SelectionFlag_SetupEndSelected
member.summary: (Value: 8) Selects the end marker for the Setup step group.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectionFlags.SelectionFlag_MainEndSelected
member.summary: (Value: 16) Selects the end marker for the Main step group.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectionFlags.SelectionFlag_CleanupEndSelected
member.summary: (Value: 32) Selects the end marker for the Cleanup step group.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectionFlags.SelectionFlag_SetupCollapsed
member.summary: (Value: 64) Collapses the Setup step group.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectionFlags.SelectionFlag_MainCollapsed
member.summary: (Value: 128) Collapses the Main step group.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.Interop.UI.Support.SelectionFlags.SelectionFlag_CleanupCollapsed
member.summary: (Value: 256) Collapses the Cleanup step group.
